basics.name: Chaselyn Pugh
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a student at the University of Hawaii, studying for a B.S. in Computer Science. I expect to graduate in 2019 and look forward to pursuing my career as a software engineer!

highlights: Contributed to C++ modules for Oceanit’s Computer Vision software that increased functionality in viewing and analyzing images
Contributed to an application in Python that utilized Oceanit’s Computer Vision software to bring image analysis capabilities to the client
Provided techinical consulting to a Department of Defence client by providing in-depth analysis to characterize malicious activity and provide new innovative ways of discovering cyber activity.
Utilized Python scripts to automate data manipulation and improve analysis across target sets and increase analysis efficiency
Created C++ analytics to parse, extract, and normalize data, enabling intelligence analysis that otherwise would have been unavailable
Conducted malware analysis to enable further understanding of tactics, techniques and protocols of advanced persisten threats (APTS)
Performed intelligence analysis through content evaluation and reported analysis to other intelligence organizations through product reporting
Effectively managed numerous junior Marines as a sergeant and in a team lead role

awards.title: Performance and Team awards
awards.summary: Awarded three different Performance and Team awards within Booz Allen Hamilton for exceptional technical delivery and outstanding achievments within the client space.
